participant_1.name: Charles
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, Charles is often seen as a go-getter who strives for success and enjoys the finer things in life.
participant_1.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i plan to go to business school next year.

participant_2.name: Samira
participant_2.personality: Resilient and determined, Samira has a strong sense of loyalty and a desire to prove herself in challenging situations.
participant_2.background: i did not graduate high school. my favourite food is shawarma. i am in the army. my grandfather served in world war a.
